Articles.Content:
Jeb, Rodmin and Frozon died in a spectacular crash during a landing attempt on Duna. The next time I open KSP, this is what the main menu looked like.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
That's an easter egg blizzy78 included with his toolbar plugin. It appears at random times...
Yes, many threads have been created about it already. Refer to this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88286-SPOILER-%28possibly%29-New-main-menu-screen/page9?p=1313669#post1313669
